about_the_game:
Morvyn Gutter

Welcome to Morvyn Gutter, a gripping pixel art horror RPG that plunges you into the heart of a city's darkest secret. When you find yourself trapped in the city's infamous sewer system—known only as "The Gutter"—your quest for escape becomes a descent into a nightmarish labyrinth where reality and nightmare intertwine.

Story:

In a city where rumors whisper of eerie disappearances and inexplicable phenomena beneath the streets, you and your friends must unravel the mystery surrounding The Gutter. What started as a simple exploration soon spirals into a surreal journey through a twisted world teeming with danger and intrigue. Every turn reveals a new layer of the Gutter’s horrifying secrets.

Gameplay:

Turn-Based Combat: Engage in turn-based battles against a variety of vicious monsters lurking in the shadows. Master your skills and craft clever tactics to overcome the grotesque foes that inhabit The Gutter.

Character Development: Level up and enhance your character's abilities as you delve deeper into the sewer's depths.

Gear and Shops: Scavenge for valuable loot or visit local shops to purchase essential gear and items. Equip yourself with weapons and armor that can mean the difference between life and death in this hostile environment.

Side Quests: Venture beyond the main storyline to complete side quests. These optional missions provide additional challenges and rewards, uncovering even more about the strange world you’ve been thrown into.

Atmospheric Pixel Art: Experience the eerie charm of retro-inspired pixel art, which sets the perfect tone for the unsettling atmosphere of The Gutter. Each environment is meticulously crafted to immerse you in this hauntingly beautiful world.

Will you uncover the truth behind the city’s dark legends, or will you become another lost soul wandering through the depths? Prepare yourself for a chilling adventure where every step brings you closer to the edge of sanity. Are you ready to face the horrors that lurk beneath?

content_descriptors.notes: Morvyn Gutter features graphic depictions of violence, gore, and blood. It includes unsettling imagery, bullying, and death, as well as occasional slurs. Player discretion is advised due to its intense and mature content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel N4100 (or similar) or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: In Morvyn Gutter, a pixel art horror RPG, you explore a nightmarish sewer system, battling monsters in turn-based combat. Level up, buy gear, and uncover a twisted story filled with eerie secrets and surreal dangers.
